name: Crash-island
description:
Title: Crash Island

Platform: PC

Genre: Survival, Crafting

Release Date: 14 July 2020

Summary: 

You wake up in an uninhabited island after a plane crash, you are one of few survivors and your main goal is to repair the planes radio in order to call for help. Gather, discover, and craft in order to survive the challenges that stand in between you and your salvation.

Your goal is to gather the 3 pieces of the radio, craft the radio and call for help.

Keybinds: Crafting Guide:

Axe: 1 Stone + 2 Wood

Pick Axe : 2 Stone + 1 Wood

Fishing Rod: 3 Wood

Poster: How to play:

Download the zip file and extract it.

Run the CrashIsland.exe file.
